recipesJson.name: Nog Milk #TheChristmasMix
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: Who doesn't like eggnog around Christmas time amiright? The Christmas Mix is amazing!

reviews.text: It’s yummy. It fixes the too-light milky and eggy notes with FLV Eggnog, without watering down the delightful spice of FLV Eggnog, along with adding a lovely touch of vanilla. All that’s missing now is the booze!
Love this stuff. Very rich and custardy, eggnog is the perfect amount. Well done!
